pages.name: PUser
pages.description: Shows a dashboard of user profile card, profile editor

controls.name: CLogin
controls.description: Launches a login view when clicked.  If user is not logged in then shows 'Login' else shows 'Logout'

controls.name: CProfileCard
controls.description: Shows user's profile data in a concise layout.  Supports password reset, email and avatar management

stores.name: SAuth
stores.description: Manages user auth and logged in state.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: True if app is in a loading state.  Bind your progress indicators here.

properties.name: isLoggedIn
properties.description: True iff user is logged in

properties.name: loginErrMessage
properties.description: Any error messages from loggin in should be emitted here.

properties.name: loginAPIEndpoint
properties.description: The endpoint for the login api (i.e. /api/login)
